function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of links to various websites","Impact":"Potential exposure to phishing attacks or malware","Mitigation":"Educate users on verifying the authenticity of links before clicking","Technologies":"Anti-phishing software, URL scanners","People":"General internet users","Owner":"Website administrators"},{"Description":"Minimization of danger in route planning","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation in populated areas","Mitigation":"Encourage route planning that avoids crowded areas","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, route optimization algorithms","People":"City planners, public health officials","Owner":"Urban developers"},{"Description":"Promotion of COVID-19 route tracking","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks for individuals sharing their routes","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and user consent for route tracking","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, secure API protocols","People":"App users, software developers","Owner":"App developers"}]}
